subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Dave Williams, who was viewed as a potential replacement for Darren Oliver as the Mets’ long reliever and an emergency starter, had an operation this week to repair a herniated disk in his neck.
snippet: Dave Williams, who was viewed as a potential replacement for Darren Oliver as the Mets’ long reliever and an emergency starter, had an operation this week to repair a herniated disk in his neck.
